channel.title: Gizmodo
channel.description: Gizmodo, the gadget guide. So much in love with shiny new toys, it's unnatural.
channel.feedburner:browserFriendly: This is an XML content feed. It is intended to be viewed in a newsreader or syndicated to another site.

item.title: Hulu Plus Subscription Service May Launch Next Week [Unconfirmed]
item.description:
We know Hulu should start offering subscription plans soon, we just don't know when. But there are plenty of whispers that the video streaming site would begin beta testing of its Hulu Plus subscription service next week. [AllThingsD] More »



Hulu - Hulu Plus - Subscription business model - Broadcasting - PlayStation Network
item.dc:creator: Rosa Golijan

item.title: Cheap, Portable Cell Phone Add-on Allows for Vision Tests Anywhere [Cellphones]
item.description:
Cell phones come with all kinds of applications these days, but researchers at MIT have developed one with the power to change more than just a Facebook status. More »



Mobile phone - cellphone - Science and Technology - Cell Phones and Driving - Health Concerns
item.dc:creator: PopSci

item.title: Single Serving Wine Glass Drowns Your Multiple Sorrows [Booze]
item.description:
A box of wine is portable, but not classy. Stemware is classy, but not portable. But in a stroke of mad genius, inventor James Nash has combined the two to revolutionize drinking on the go. Cheers! Meet the Tulip. More »



Shopping - Kitchen and Dining - Home and Garden - Wine Accessories - Wine
item.dc:creator: Brian Barrett

item.title: Huge Millennium Falcon Play Fort for a Kid and His Wookiee [Star Wars]
item.description:
I wish I had this Millennium Falcon—with a solar-powered illuminated interior and exteior—as the top of my backyard fort when I was a kid. But then again, I never had a fort or a backyard back then. More »



Millennium Falcon - starwars - Recreation - Science Fiction - Game
item.dc:creator: Jesus Diaz

item.title: "Bright Pill" for Male Birth Control Shows Promise in Early Tests [Birth Control]
item.description:
The quest for a male birth control method has taken some weird turns. The latest contender for the elusive male pill is an Israeli scientist who says he has developed a compound that temporarily inhibits the reproductive capacity of sperm. More »



Birth control - Reproductive health - Health - Hormonal Contraceptives - Combined oral contraceptive pill
item.dc:creator: Mara Hvistendahl - PopSci

item.title: These Cancer Cells Were Spotted With a DSLR [Medicine]
item.description:
This is an image of a tissue sample that doctors could use to detect cancerous cells. It's crisp, it's clear, it could save a life. And it was taken with a $400 Olympus E-330. More »



Cancer - Health - Conditions and Diseases - Organizations - Medicine
item.dc:creator: Brian Barrett

item.title: Apple Acknowledges iPhone 4 Reception Issues, Says Don't Hold It Like That [Iphone 4]
item.description:
Here's Apple's response to the now officially-acknowledged iPhone 4 antenna reception problems. More »



IPhone - Apple - Smartphone - Handhelds - Musical ensemble

item.title: Russia Searches For Its Own Silicon Valley [Russia]
item.description:
When Russian president Dmitry Medvedev visited Silicon Valley last week, it wasn't a social call. It was a scouting expedition, in preparation for building his country's own "Innovation City" from the ground up. But can tech supremacy be manufactured? More »



Russia - Silicon Valley - United States - Twitter - California
item.dc:creator: Brian Barrett

item.title: I Am T-Pain Autotuner App Adds Video For iOS4 [Apps]
item.description:
Maybe the best use of the front-facing camera I've seen yet comes from Smule's auto-tunetastic I Am T-Pain app. Because now, you can star in your own autotuned music video. It's pretty genius. More »



I Am T-Pain - Smule - Medicine - Pain Management - Medical Specialties
item.dc:creator: Brian Barrett

item.title: Test Notes: iPhone 4 Call Quality [Iphone 4]
item.description:
The iPhone 4 is supposed to have better reception than prior generations. Its additional noise-cancellation microphone should result in better call quality and less distortion during chats. Our somewhat unscientific tests confirmed it—iPhone 4 is go for talk. More »



IPhone - Smartphones - Handhelds - Apple - iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: Rosa Golijan and Jason Chen

item.title: iPhone 4 Uploads Files 5-10x Faster [Iphone 4]
item.description:
We sent the intrepid Ryan Salerno across 20 NY blocks armed with an iPhone 3GS and an iPhone 4. He ran speed tests along the way, ferreting out any oddities. Downloads? Exactly the same. Uploads? An order of magnitude faster. More »



iPhone - Smartphone - Handhelds - Wallpapers and Themes - Shopping
item.dc:creator: Mark Wilson

item.title: Hoodie With Earbuds Instead of Strings Is Greatest iPod Accessory of All [Apparel]
item.description:
Hoodies have strings around the neck, right? Have you EVER used those strings? Why you'd want to tighten a noose around your neck, I'll never know. The HoodieBuddie cleverly replaces the strings with earbuds; the pocket contains a 3.5mm jack. More »



IPod - Shopping - Music - Consumer Electronics - Apple iPod
item.dc:creator: Kat Hannaford

item.title: Something Seems Out of Place at the Soho Apple Store [Image Cache]
item.description:
These poor AT&T techs, with their Dells and Blackberrys, set up hidden away next to the glass staircase on a folding table, looked so bored and uncomfortable. There's a metaphor for Apple and AT&T's relationship in here somewhere, I think. More »



Apple - AppleStore - Macintosh - Apple II - AT&T
item.dc:creator: Adam Frucci

item.title: Official Tumblr iPhone App Now Supports iOS4 and Twitter [IPhone Apps]
item.description:
After Tumblr acquired Tumblerette and the iPhone app got renamed simply "Tumblr" (catchy, eh?), the hip New Yorkers have updated it to version 1.2, with native reblogging, more photo-posting options, and even support for iOS4 multitasking. Those thoughtful guys. More »



iPhone - Smartphone - Handhelds - Nokia - Finland
item.dc:creator: Kat Hannaford

item.title: Test Notes: FaceTime [Iphone4]
item.description:
Videocalling has been a sci-fi staple for decades. From 2001 to Back to the Future people chatting face-to-face from great distances was a way of saying "Hey, look, it's the future!" So does Facetime mean we're in the future? More »



IPhone - Apple - Handhelds - Smartphones - Steve Jobs
item.dc:creator: Adam Frucci

item.title: Give Your Ancient Android Sparkling New Features With This Free App [Android Apps]
item.description:
Around 50 per cent of Androids still run under 1.6, making this ADW.Launcher app a must-download app. It brings some of the later features of Android to the early OS versions, such as multiple screens. Need more convincing? It's free. More »



Android - Handhelds - Android Market - Operating system - app
item.dc:creator: Kat Hannaford

item.title: Your iPhone 4 Warranty and Insurance Options [Insurance]
item.description:
The iPhone 4 is far from indestructible. Hell, it's starting to seem like it might actually be fragile. So here, for worrywarts and klutzes alike, is an overview of some warranty and insurance plans in case things go wrong. More »



iPhone - Smartphone - Handhelds - Insurance - Financial Services
item.dc:creator: Kyle VanHemert

item.title: FaceTime Does Not Work Over Google Voice [Facetime]
item.description:
Now that everyone can get Google Voice, you'll be wondering if you can use FaceTime while making or receiving a call through Google Voice. Well, you can't. Gotta make a naked call without GV. More »



googlevoice - Google - Searching - Search Engines - Companies
item.dc:creator: Jason Chen

item.title: Test Notes: iPhone 4 App Speed [Iphone4]
item.description:
Day-to-day, the speed difference between the iPhone 4 and the iPhone 3GS isn't that different. But in more intensive apps and games? The iPhone 4 smokes the 3GS and is nearly as fast as the iPad. More »



IPhone - iPhone 3G - Smartphone - Handhelds - Apple
item.dc:creator: Casey Chan

item.title: Gadget Deals of the Day [Dealzmodo]
item.description:
Having a bad day? Bad week ? Well, I've got just the thing to turn that frown upside down! A Giant LCD Widescreen, amazing video games, camcorders! And best of all, free Lemonade!!! Don't be shy and peruse away!! More »



Game - Video Games - Shopping - Dealzmodo - History

item.title: Test Notes: iPhone 4 Screen [Iphone 4]
item.description:
When I try to look for the pixels, I get close. Then closer. Before I can discern them, my vision goes cross-eyed, blurry. Eyes: 0; Retina Display: 1. More »



IPhone - Apple - Handhelds - Smartphones - Pixel
item.dc:creator: brian lam & matt buchanan

item.title: Apple Support Says iPhone 4 Yellow Tint Problem Is "Residue From Manufacturing" [Iphone 4]
item.description:
For the first time, Apple support technicians have pointed at a manufacturing issue as the origin of the yellow bands and spots that people are finding in their iPhone 4's displays. There's no official word from Apple yet, however. More »



IPhone - Apple - Smartphone - Handhelds - iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: Jesus Diaz

item.title: The Incredibly Slow, Incredibly Hot Soho iPhone 4 Line [Iphone 4 Launch]
item.description:
I got to the line at the NYC Soho Apple Store at about 6:40 this morning, 20 minutes before they opened the doors. I knew I'd be far back, but I figured it would move relatively quickly. I was wrong! More »



iPhone 3G - IPhone - Smartphone - Handhelds - Apple
item.dc:creator: Adam Frucci

item.title: Flickr Spruces Up With Black Background and Larger Images [Photographs]
item.description:
Four years in, paying the annual subscription for my Flickr Pro account remains the best purchase I've ever made online. It's only going to get better, with the new redesign including larger images, location data, and better navigational tools. More »



Flickr - Recreation - Urban Exploration - Outdoors - Image Galleries
item.dc:creator: Kat Hannaford

item.title: Hopefully Your Fedex Guy Doesn't Throw Your iPhone 4 Like This [Fedex]
item.description:
Here's a video we captured of a Fedex guy "dropping off" a package at our home. Hopefully the packaging on your iPhone is protected enough that this doesn't happen to you. More »



IPhone - Smartphone - Handhelds - FedEx - Apple
item.dc:creator: Jason Chen

item.title: Crop 'em, Danno! The Aspect Ratio Police Are On The Case [HDTV]
item.description:
When I was young, I loved going to the movies. I loved widescreen epics in Cinerama, Cinemascope, Super Panavision. VistaVision, etc. Watching these movies on TV, however, was painful because I could tell I was not seeing the entire image. More »



High-definition television - Arts - Television - Movies - History
item.dc:creator: Tony Hurd

item.title: HTC Evo Getting Minor Software Update Next Week? [Smartphones]
item.description:
A Sprint source has leaked to BGR that the HTC Evo will mostly likely be getting a software update on June 28th. The update would bring improved Wi-Fi (802.11n, we're guessing), fix Exchange issues and repair a battery-draining problem with the official Facebook app. Why Sprint continues to have their Nascar app run in the background of all Evos at all times, we still don't know. [BGR] More »



HTC Corporation - Sprint - Sports - Motorsports - Auto Racing
item.dc:creator: Mark Wilson

item.title: Early Pac-Man Sketches Are Primitive Digital Art [Art]
item.description:
Pac-Man's creator, Toru Iwatani, allegedly carries his top secret sketches around with him wherever he goes, no doubt believing they're safer strapped to his vest than locked in a vault somewhere. Personally, I believe they belong in a museum. More »



Pac-Man - Tru Iwatani - Toru Iwatani - United States - Asia
item.dc:creator: Kat Hannaford

item.title: iPhone 4 Line Essential: Three Pairs of Backup Pants [Image Cache]
item.description:
Waiting for an iPhone 4 is a rough business. Particularly, it seems, for the small-bladdered professionals among us. Carry on, brave Soho Apple Store line sitter! Secure in the knowledge that however many slacks you soil, you've got backup. [Twitpic] More »



iPhone 3G - iPhone - Handhelds - Smartphones - Apple

item.title: Woz Awaits the iPhone Like the Rest of Us, Only Safer [Woz]
item.description:
He cut the lines for the 3GS. He waited patiently for the iPad. And today, Apple co-founder Steve Wozniak has queued up at an Apple Store wearing a safety vest. What's he got planned? More »

item.title: iPhone 4 Loses Reception When You Hold It By The Antenna Band? [Iphone 4]
item.description:
This is a reader video found on Macrumors forums illustrating something weird. When the guy holds the iPhone in his hands, touching the outside antenna band in two places, he drops reception. Placing the phone down gets him 4 bars. More »

item.title: iPhone 4's Real Cost Versus Other Top Smartphones [Iphone 4]
item.description:
iPhone 4, Droid Incredible, Evo 4G, and Nexus One hardware all cost about the same. But this chart shows exactly how much each will put you out of pocket—data/voice included—over the course of a two year contract. More »

item.title: The Real Dangers of Being an Early Adopter [Blockquote]
item.description:
This morning, Mashable reporter Sam Axon apparently got stuck up in line waiting for his iPhone 4. Let this be a lesson, early adopters: keep your bumpers on and your wits about you. [Samuel Axon via SAI] More »

item.description:
Did you hear? It's iPhone 4 release day! Which is going to mean a lot of iPhone 4 posts here on Giz. Here's how you can clear your screen of all of them: More »

item.title: Some iPhone 4 Displays Have Yellow Bands, Spots, Other Problems [Iphone 4]
item.description:
There's a problem with the iPhone 4's Retina displays: Some screens have a yellow tint across the surface. 55 cases and counting. In some, it's a yellow band. In others, yellow spots. See the gallery. [Updated with Apple support feedback] More »

item.title: First iPhone 4 Broken After One-Foot Drop [Apple]
item.description:
This is not a drop test. This is the first iPhone 4 that breaks after a simple accident that anyone may have: A one-foot drop. Updated. More »

item.title: World's Largest Vuvuzela Blows a Mighty BZZZZZZZ [Vuvuzela]
item.description:
This is the world's largest vuvuzela. While it may look like a fun prop, it's actually—terrifyingly—fully functional. And if you thought a stadium full of these was annoying, just listen to what gigantor here can do: More »

item.title: Nokia Ditching Symbian for N-Series Phones [Nokia]
item.description:
Symbian is being retired for Nokia's flagship range of phones, with the 720p-shooting N8 being the last phone to see the dated OS running on its little body. From now on, it's MeeGo all the way. More »



Nokia - Symbian OS - Symbian - Smartphone - Mobile Computing
item.dc:creator: Kat Hannaford
